title: Linux Issues
body:
I simply cannot get LoL installed onto Ubuntu 16.04, I even freshly installed 16.04 to try again. I've tried every way possible to get playonlinux working properly, as well as it's partner Wine. When I begin installing via PoL, I get an error 403, access forbidden.
I had tried it before on 16.04, and tried it after upgrading to 17.04. Same results, no matter what I tried

replies.body: At the moment League isn't quite fully supported for Linux systems. You mentioned using Wine however, and I know many of our players have had some success using it to get League running. I'm not super familiar with it myself, but [**this reddit thread**](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflinux/comments/5ukgur/a_revised_guide_for_installing_league_of_legends/) gives some pretty detailed steps on the process.
